patthana13.7:1.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ
patthana13.7:1.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.7:1.1_2: paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana13.7:1.1_3: napītisahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ
patthana13.7:1.1_4: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.7:1.1_5: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana13.7:1.1_6: hetupaccayā. Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato
patthana13.7:2.1: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
patthana13.7:3.1: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
patthana13.7:4.1: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.7:5.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
